Indented text blocks are rendered as blockquotes
.
Paragraph text

    This is a blockquote.
    It can span multiple lines.
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<blockquote>This is a blockquote.
It can span multiple lines.</blockquote>
.

Blockquotes are rendered without paragraph tags
.
Paragraph text

    This is the first paragraph of a blockquote.

    This is the second paragraph of a blockquote.

Paragraph text
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<blockquote>This is the first paragraph of a blockquote.</blockquote>
<blockquote>This is the second paragraph of a blockquote.</blockquote>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
.

Nested blockquotes are rendered with a depth indicator
.
Paragraph text

    This is a blockquote that quotes someone else:

        This is a nested blockquote.

    Then the first blockquote continues.

Paragraph text
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<blockquote>This is a blockquote that quotes someone else:</blockquote>
<blockquote class="indent-2">This is a nested blockquote.</blockquote>
<blockquote>Then the first blockquote continues.</blockquote>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
.

Text indents are normalized to four spaces
.
Paragraph text

 Paragraph text

  Paragraph text

   Paragraph text

    Blockquote text

     Blockquote text

      Blockquote text

       Blockquote text

        Nested blockquote
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<blockquote>Blockquote text</blockquote>
<blockquote>Blockquote text</blockquote>
<blockquote>Blockquote text</blockquote>
<blockquote>Blockquote text</blockquote>
<blockquote class="indent-2">Nested blockquote</blockquote>
.
